column4: actually i want the latest version of qemu for jaunty currently only in lucid repos. i just wanted to know how can i install it in jaunty. Its not in jaunty-backports and i dont want to comile it manually. any other way??
the latest version is not in karmic. its only in lucid
can i install the latest qemu from debian sid??
you *can* do pretty much as you like - BUT its likely to break your system and is therefor not recommended and not supported
